title: >>> Musical "RECORDS"
body_text:
Just days away from the biggest dodgeball spectacle of all-time, DODGEBALL 50!
..........
There is no need to wait or prolong this major announcement ...
Not one, but three songs will commemorate this milestone event:
I.
Led Zeppelin
"In The Evening"
II.
Rush
"Summertime Blues"
III.
Audioslave
"Show me how to Live"
Better be ready for the event of the summer!
..........
One important concern raised through all of the hype and build-up for DODGEBALL 50 always deals with the attendance for the event itself.
Past "ten" events have seen tremendous success, with record-breaking numbers:
DODGEBALL X: 24
DODGEBALL 20: 37 (Third highest attendance ever)
DODGEBALL 30: 34 (Despite being a "Wet War", a top ten overall attendance)
DODGEBALL XL: 36 (Fifth highest attendance ever)
There is no question that in order to make dodgeball "big" figuratively, it must be "big" literally.
Some extraordinary, and more so secretive "things", for lack of a better word, are planned. Once again, this is no ordinary event; the captains battle itself proves that. So with all of these new additions seen exclusively for the first time at DODGEBALL 50 along with a nice mix of tradition, it is a sure guarantee that DODGEBALL 50 will indeed be the biggest event of all time.
As for the important question ...
HOW MANY PEOPLE WILL ATTEND DODGEBALL 50?

Just days away from the biggest dodgeball spectacle of all-time, DODGEBALL 50!

..........

There is no need to wait or prolong this major announcement ...

Not one, but three songs will commemorate this milestone event:
I. Led Zeppelin "In The Evening"

Better be ready for the event of the summer!

..........

One important concern raised through all of the hype and build-up for DODGEBALL 50 always deals with the attendance for the event itself.

Past "ten" events have seen tremendous success, with record-breaking numbers:
DODGEBALL X: 24
DODGEBALL 20: 37 (Third highest attendance ever)
DODGEBALL 30: 34 (Despite being a "Wet War", a top ten overall attendance)
DODGEBALL XL: 36 (Fifth highest attendance ever)

There is no question that in order to make dodgeball "big" figuratively, it must be "big" literally.

Some extraordinary, and more so secretive "things", for lack of a better word, are planned. Once again, this is no ordinary event; the captains battle itself proves that. So with all of these new additions seen exclusively for the first time at DODGEBALL 50 along with a nice mix of tradition, it is a sure guarantee that DODGEBALL 50 will indeed be the biggest event of all time.

As for the important question ...
